a.span: HMH Ed: Your Friend in Learning

div.h2: All Leading Edge Academy school sites are closed, per the state school closure mandate, through the end of the school year. Please continue to check this website, your email, and our Social Media pages for updates and information for digital instruction.

div.style: z-index: 5; white-space: nowrap; font-size: 50px; line-height: 22px; font-weight: 800; color: #ffffff; letter-spacing: 0px;font-family:Open Sans;

a.title: Enrollment

div.class: vc_separator wpb_content_element vc_separator_align_center vc_sep_width_100 vc_sep_pos_align_center vc_separator_no_text vc_sep_color_grey

div.p: Leading Edge Academy is a network of K-12 Tuition-free Charter Schools with campuses throughout the valley. We’re proud to offer advanced academics and character development in a technology-enriched environment.
Please have a look around to learn about the various campuses and programs that are a part of the Leading Edge Academy Network!

A glimpse of what you’ll find:
✔ Tuition Free
✔ K-12
✔ Small Class Sizes
✔ Advanced Academics
✔ Free Full Day Kindergarten
✔ Gilbert, Mesa, Queen Creek, and Maricopa Campuses
✔ Online Academy
